properties.question: Which characteristic is most commonly associated with a superficial basal cell carcinoma as seen in the provided photographs?
properties.option_a: A translucent nodule covered with telangiectasias
properties.option_b: A well-defined, pearly border with a translucent nodule
properties.option_c: A flat lesion with irregular borders and varying colors
properties.option_d: A nodular growth with central ulceration and satellite lesions
